body: @tychedelia Any ideas? This looks like your area.
Yeah, happy to look into this later this week. Thanks for providing a repro @brandon-reinhart.

body:
git bisecting right now and on cca0f7902220e8a6b7fd166b20714a0a6555c9fa it was already present, but on it, it has a more predictable pattern

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e463d7d6-697d-499f-a37e-b1fc1b0807c5
Bisected, i was expecting it to be related to retained render world, but no, it much, MUCH older, b6ead2be95d8e6d955fa026a826410b640db4dbd

> Bisected, i was expecting it to be related to retained render world, but no, it much, MUCH older, [b6ead2b](https://github.com/bevyengine/bevy/commit/b6ead2be95d8e6d955fa026a826410b640db4dbd)

Whoa!! I was expecting something similar. Thanks for doing that, this will really help track down what's going on.
You git magicians and your magic box of tricks. I wish to subscribe to your newsletter.
